title: NEW U.F.R
body: not sure what riot thinking but if the new urf gonna be like that i aint gonna be playing it because i find it to be rubbish , because i would hope it would be left the same. what the point of fixing something that is not broken {{champion:92}} ( my opinion)

replies.body: They give it to you... you either accept it or don't accept it and if you don't....not like they care bc they work hard to even get a new mode in

> what the point of fixing something that is not broken

That's not the intention. The intention is to put a new twist on the game mode, which they've done. If you don't want to play it, or even give it a chance, that's your choice.
